title: Building
description: Schema for objects of the type "Building"

GlobalId.description: The unique id of the wall in the UUID notation according to IETF RFC 4122, e.g 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000

LateBindedDataTemplate.description: Definition if data template that can be lately binded to the schema. The late binded properties are not part of the core specification
